name: Fonglets Exploding Clothes
description:
Exploding clothes, works OKish You can increase the lora strength above one to get a stronger exploding affect, but the stronger you go the worse it ruins faces.

I strongly recommend you combine this with the bouncing breasts lora by moonlight for ultimate clothes explosion effect.

With a bit of fine tuning the issues could be fixed, but as usual I'm training on my potato pc which takes 11 hours to train so you'll have to make do because that's too damn long.
